entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
